snippet: For nearly all of 2010 and 2011, job growth was stronger for men than for women. But in the last few months, the trend has turned around: since December, job growth has been significantly stronger for women than men.
abstract: For nearly all of 2010 and 2011, job growth was stronger for men than for women. But in the last few months, the trend has turned around: since December, job growth has been significantly stronger for women than men.

headline.main: Has the He-covery Become a She-covery?
